attributes.description:
There is no doubt the Ranger can function supremely well as a working ute but it can also easily slip into suburban and city life, no worries.
Features of this vehicle include a Multi-Function Steering Wheel, Electric Windows, Electric Mirrors, Bluetooth Connectivity, Air-Conditioning, Power Steering, Central Locking and much more!
Come in today and test drive this car, IT IS FOR YOU! Don’t delay we will evaluate your existing vehicle for FREE. We will not short-change you. Visit our website to see our full range of stock. A 1% of the value of the vehicle non-refundable deposit, secures the vehicle for two days. If that deposit lapses, You would be required to put another non-refundable deposit to secure it further. Please be aware of scams with fraudsters using other advertiser’s photos. DO NOT pay any deposits unless you deal and pay deposits directly into Primo Executive Cars bank account!
